title: Holy
description: This Place is your one-stop site for a spirit filled church in VIJAYAWADA.

title: Love
description: Our doors are wide open to people from all backgrounds, languages and profession regardless of where they are on their spiritual journey with God. We believe you are important and God has a plan and purpose for your life because He loves you.

title: Faith
description: Our purpose is to lead people to Jesus and membership in his family, teach them to worship the Lord and magnify his name, develop them to Christ-like maturity, and equip them for ministry in the church and outside the church.

title: Hope
description: We believe you are that person whom God wants to bless this week. Come join us as we meet on Sundays and at various centres during the week in the city of Vijayawada.
